. Kleppe is part of the flat geographical area
Local trains on Jærbanen (between Stavanger and Egersund) stops at the station Klepp. Trains are operated by the Norwegian national train operator NSB
. Note: Klepp station is not in the town of Kleppe, but in a small town about 2.5 km east of Kleppe. Buses operated by Kolumbus
run between Kleppe and Klepp train station.
Local buses run between Kleppe and Bryne, Sola, Sandnes and Stavanger. Kolumbus

value: content=Nice and green park area between Kleppe and Verdalen. The paths, including a 3 km long illuminated path, are accessible for wheel chairs. There is also a music pavilion in the park. The hill Kleppevarden, with its millennium monument, can be accessed from Kleppelunden.
